sentences.english: After pulling off the shell, she observed the hard-boiled egg inside.
sentences.chinese: 當女兒敲碎蛋殼發現裏面已經是被煮得很硬的蛋白。

sentences.english: As soon as the baby cormorant breaks the eggs, it is watched by Damin himself.
sentences.chinese: 小鸕鶿一啄破蛋殼，大明就親自照看它。

sentences.english: That eagle might be a hatchling, or simply snuggling inside the shell.
sentences.chinese: 它也許只是只雛鷹，抑或還依偎在蛋殼之中。

sentences.english: Nanon carried off the plate with the eggshells.
sentences.chinese: 拿儂把盛蛋殼的盤子端走。

sentences.english: Let's put some feathers above the egg shell.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們把一些羽毛以上的雞蛋殼。

sentences.english: Crack the eggs and separate yolks from whites, very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 敲開蛋殼，然後小心地把蛋黃從蛋清中分離出來。

sentences.english: These egg shells were cut with a high intensity precision Laser Beam.
sentences.chinese: 以高強度高精度激光束來雕刻這些雞蛋殼。

sentences.english: Do add lime, small amounts of wood ashes or crushed eggshells to the compost pile.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在堆肥中加入石灰，少量的木灰和碎蛋殼。

sentences.english: Paper with a dull egg-shell surface.
sentences.chinese: 有著像雞蛋殼的暗淡色調的紙。

sentences.english: It has been known to us that the protein is conducive to the construction of the eggshell Calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 大家已經知道這個蛋白對蛋殼碳酸鈣的形成有幫助。

sentences.english: Crack an egg into the pan and throw the shell into the garbage.
sentences.chinese: 打一個雞蛋放入鍋中並將雞蛋殼扔進垃圾箱。

sentences.english: Chicks are hatching from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 小雞正從蛋殼裏孵出來。

sentences.english: When Roc Hatchling comes into play, put four shell counters on it.
sentences.chinese: 當雛巨鳥進場時，放四個蛋殼指示物在上面。

sentences.english: an eggshell-blue trouser suit with white sandals.
sentences.chinese: 穿着蛋殼藍套裝和白色涼鞋。

sentences.english: Six little ducklings come out of their shells.
sentences.chinese: 然後蛋殼裂了，五隻小鴨孵出來了。

sentences.english: The technological processing of calcium lactate from egg shells is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本試驗對雞蛋殼製備乳酸鈣的工藝進行了研究。

definition: to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
